Detailed Description

Retrieve or calculate nitrogen gains, given a nitrogen run ID.

void GainFinder::setThresholds ( double  min,
double  max,
double  percent 
)

Set gain cutoff thresholds.

The default values are used if this method is not called explicitly.

Parameters:
min- minimim adc value to include in gain calculation (default is 50)
max- maximum adc value to include in gain calculation (default 1000)
percent- percent of camera above which the image is considered "saturated" and should be ignored for gain calculations (default 0.75)
